attributes.action: Stop Vets from charging to sign Insurance forms for Pet owners to claim money back that has been paid for medicines and treatment by the vet's - Further to stop Vet's from insisting on 3 monthly checks for animals that have long term illnesses such as Arthritis, Incontinence, Cushing’s Syndrome etc.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We feel very strongly that we are being ripped off by Vet's as detailed below.

The Vet charges for signing Insurance Forms  
The Vet's are insisting on charging for; signing Insurance forms for each aliment separately so that the we can claim back money we have already paid Vet’s for Medicines, treatment or piscriptions we obtain for Medicines from other organisations charging half the price to that of the Vet's medicines.

The Vet wants to charge for the issue of piscriptions.
The Vet wants to charge 3 monthly for each aliment check-up.
The Vet is also making his own regulation on the need for health checks on animals of every 3 months for each ailment (This used to be done Once a year then they wanted a Six monthly and now a Three Monthly) This is not endorsed by The RSVS or The Vetenarian Medicines Directorate.

The Vet wants to charge without openly published prices at the Surgery for treatment and makes up the charges as he goes along!
